      • getPathSimilarity

        public SimilarityValue[] getPathSimilarity(java.lang.String word1,
                                  java.lang.String pos1,
                                  int sid1,
                                  java.lang.String word2,
                                  java.lang.String pos2,
                                  int sid2,
                                  boolean use_virtual_root)
        Function to calculate semantic similarity using the path length measure. 7 parameters are to be passed to the function.
        Parameters:
        word1 - First input word
        pos1 - Part of speech of the first input word. Input should be one of "n","v","a","r". If an empty string is passed, senses of the word across all the parts of speech are considered
        sid1 - Sense id of the first word. Sense id is not valid if POS is not entered.
        word2 - Second input word
        pos2 - Part of speech of the second input word. If an empty string is passed, senses of the word across all the parts of speech are considered
        sid2 - Sense id of the second word. Sense id is not valid if POS is not entered.
        use_virtual_root - Boolean parameter to indicate if a virtual root node is to be used for computing similarity
        Returns:
        Array of SimilarityValue objects. Each SimilarityValue object contains the similarity value between a pair of synsets of the given input words.

      • getPathSimilarity

        public SimilarityValue[] getPathSimilarity(java.lang.String word1,
                                  java.lang.String word2,
                                  boolean use_virtual_root)
        Path Length Measure of Similarity Function to calculate similarity between two words using the path length measure
